title: Baked chocolate orange cheesecake
ingredients: ['60g butter, melted', '100g digestive biscuits, crushed', '200g plain chocolate, such as Bourneville®, broken into squares', '1 orange, zested and juiced', '400g full fat Philadelphia® cream cheese', '2 medium eggs', '60g caster sugar', '200ml double cream', "1 Terry's® Chocolate Orange"]
